data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gabriel, Ray, Longhorn, Stuart J. (2015): Revised generic placement of Brachypelmaembrithes (Chamberlin & Ivie, 1936) and Brachypelmaangustum Valerio, 1980, with definition of the taxonomic features for identification of female Sericopelma Ausserer, 1875 (Araneae, Theraphosidae). ZooKeys 526: 75-104, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.526.6315, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.526.6315
